meanings.definition: Having left one's job and ceased to work.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather is retired and enjoys spending time gardening.
meanings.sent2: The retired teacher volunteers at the local library.
meanings.sent3: The retired firefighter still gets excited when he hears a siren.
meanings.sent4: The retired athlete's glory days are now just memories.
meanings.sent5: The retired soldier's uniform hung proudly in the closet.

meanings.definition: Withdrawn from one's occupation or position.
meanings.sent1: The retired CEO now spends his days painting landscapes.
meanings.sent2: She is a retired nurse who now travels the world.
meanings.sent3: The retired magician still surprises his grandchildren with tricks.
meanings.sent4: The retired actor's spotlight has dimmed, but his talent shines on.
meanings.sent5: The retired astronaut's adventures are now in the history books.

meanings.sent1: The retired military general now advises the government.
meanings.sent2: The retired police officer enjoys fishing in his free time.
meanings.sent3: The retired race car driver still feels the need for speed.
meanings.sent4: The retired ship has weathered many storms in its lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The retired clock no longer ticks, but its hands still point the way.
